haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.gui.composite

Class EntryComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.gui.composite.EntryComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScriptableFactory, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable

    public class EntryComposite
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
implements ScriptableFactory
    The EntryComposite is a wrapper composite for the several different Composites for OnOffEntry, PeriodicEntry, etc. The Composite features a Combo to select the desired entry type and input fields for the individual option of the entrys.
    Author:
    Andreas Basener
